catalog_info.title: Supervised Reading and Research
catalog_info.notes: Sindhumathi Revuluri and members of the Department
catalog_info.description: Open to students wishing to pursue supervised study in an area not covered by the courses currently offered. Students must submit a study proposal to the faculty member with whom they wish to study and a signed proposal to the Head Tutor. May be counted for concentration only with the prior approval of the Department.
